passage.title: My English teacher
passage.paragraph: I go to a primary school. I am in class 3. My teacher's name is Miss Black.
There are forty children in my class. I sit at the back with my friend, Lucy. We talk a lot. My friend is very clever. She gets good marks. I am copying from her work.
Miss Black is shouting at me. "Don't copy Lucy's work! Stay in after school!"
